summary:
After many years and wonderful experiences working in the restaurant industry, I decided to take my passion for building exceptional teams, business development, and connecting people and turn it into a career with ExecuSource in the rapidly growing Denver market.  For three wonderful years, I was a full desk Senior Executive Recruiter working with both clients and candidates to fill open positions throughout the U.S.  I am now currently a Senior Talent Advisor for Uber focusing on Senior Sales and Operations roles in multiple businesses all across the EMEA market.  If you are looking for a change in the next big adventure in your career I would be happy to connect!

I am originally from the small town of Mesquite, Texas and have been lucky enough to have lived and worked all over the U.S. and now reside in The Netherlands.  I am passionate about spending time outdoors, traveling, meeting new people, and learning how to be a better leader for my teams.  I’m always interested in hearing from former colleagues and meeting new people so feel free to contact me.

profile_positions.description:
Developing the hiring strategy and leading the hiring processes for some of Uber's fastest growing teams across EMEA including: Uber Ads, New Verticals, Uber Direct, Strategy & Planning, and UberEats. 

Experienced Senior Recruiter with a proven track record of success in talent acquisition across multiple businesses within Uber's European operations. Demonstrated expertise in high-volume recruiting, executive-level placements, and strategic talent acquisition initiatives with a strong focus on diversity, equity, and inclusion (DEI). Adept at building strong relationships with hiring managers and stakeholders, while delivering results that align with organizational objectives. Skilled in leveraging recruitment technologies, sourcing strategies, and market insights to attract and hire top talent. A collaborative and adaptable professional who thrives in fast-paced and dynamic environments.
profile_positions.title: Senior Talent Advisor, EMEA

profile_positions.description: Hybrid role leading a team of 4 Recruiters focusing business development and effective recruiting strategies.
profile_positions.title: Executive Recruiting Lead

profile_positions.description: Full cycle Recruiter supporting high volume to executive level roles across various industries including: Private Equity, SaaS, Cybersecurity, Healthcare, Restaurant Operations, Airline/Hospitality, Transportation Operations, Public Accounting, Aerospace and Defense
profile_positions.title: Senior Executive Recruiter

profile_positions.description:
I started my career at Raising Cane's as the Area Director At Large.  In this role I directly oversaw 10 restaurants in the Arkansas, Minnesota, Charlottesville, Athens, and Wichita Falls markets with combined yearly revenues of over $32 million.  I led a cross-functional team of Marketing Specialists, Training Advisors, Facility Managers, Recruiters, and Crew Resource Managers focusing on providing support for our Operators.  I was able to successfully recruit for and lead the grand openings of Fayetteville, AR and Blaine, MN restaurants.  All restaurants quickly achieved Gold Standard operational metrics and internal audits.  I also spearheaded the competitive compensation analysis and recruiting efforts for consistently understaffed restaurants in the Minnesota and Charlottesville markets, thereby directly improving operational performance.

In 2017 I became the Area Director of Restaurants for the Colorado Market.  I was the Business Unit Leader of 5 restaurants with combined yearly revenues of over $20 million.  Complete P&L control directing cross functional team of specialists (Marketing Specialist, Training Advisor, Recruiter, and Crew Resources Manager).  In this role I was able to:

Overhaul the Colorado market and opened 4 extremely successful restaurants with annual revenues of over $15 million

Directed, managed, and implemented yearly business plans (included 5 departments) 

Led the recruiting and training efforts of more than 30 managers and 300 crew-members for 5 restaurants

Led marketing and hiring events in the area to raise brand awareness and drive excitement for new market opening 

Headed new vendor relations and contracts

Prepared and presented monthly, quarterly, and yearly reports on market performance to the Chief Operating Officer

Spearheaded the Ft. Collins restaurant corporate acquisition and re-branding initiative
profile_positions.title: Director of Restaurants

profile_positions.location: New York, New York, United States
profile_positions.description: Had full P&L ownership of some of the busiest and most profitable Chipotle restaurants in the world overseeing restaurants in both Brooklyn and Manhattan. Top 5 in Business Scorecard, manager turnover, manager development, and YOY sales growth.  I worked with over 20 General Managers and 60 restaurant support managers to help them achieve their goals.  Directed multi-department office support team to help restaurant operators to run successful businesses.  I worked every day to ensure we had great people cultures in our restaurants by helping my managers become better leaders and the best versions of themselves.
profile_positions.title: Area Manager
